recipes.Label: Craft: Leathy
recipes.StartDescription:
Brew a Moth-Liquor. 

[Solutions & Separations with Scholar-level <sprite name=moth>, plus Beverage, creates Leathy.]
recipes.Desc: [With Keeper-level Nectar - not Moth - Leathy is a precursor to the Great Ink Marakat.]

recipes.Label: Craft: Frith-Weft
recipes.StartDescription:
A peculiar mothy weaving technique, suitable as long as you don't mind undertones of humus. 

[Weaving & Knotworking with Scholar-level <sprite name=moth>, plus Tanglebrag, creates Frith-Weft.]
recipes.Desc: [With Keeper-level Heart - not Moth - Frith-Weft is a precursor to Swaddled Thunder.]

recipes.Label: Craft: Frith-Weft
recipes.StartDescription:
Use the feather to conduct a peaceful weave. 

[Stitching & Binding with Scholar-level <sprite name=sky>, plus Awakened Feather, creates Frith-Weft.]
recipes.Desc: [With Keeper-level Heart - not Sky - Frith-Weft is a precursor to Swaddled Thunder.]

recipes.Label: Craft: Human Hair
recipes.StartDescription:
Transform remains into something of interest to crude sorcerers. 

[Transformations & Liberations with Scholar-level <sprite name=moth>, plus Remains, creates Human Hair.]
recipes.Desc: [With Scholar-level Grail, Human Hair can be woven into something almost living.]
